chapter.title: Introduction to &COMPANYABBR; Administration
chapter.para: &COMPANY; supports technical administrators at all levels of the education organization hierarchy. This part of &PRODUCTABBR;(TM) documentation instructs state and local administrators on how to perform day-to-day administrative tasks. These tasks include the following:

listitem.para: Adding and updating data in the &PRODUCTABBR; Data Store
Creating and managing realms within &PRODUCTABBR;, used to identify authentication boundaries
Mapping roles between &PRODUCTABBR; and an education organization's identity provider
Authorizing applications to use &PRODUCTABBR; for a given local education agency, including a brief overview of the application registration process
Delegating local education organization permissions to the state education organization in the same hierarchy
Configuring the Dashboard application used to view and manage data in a user-friendly interactive web application

chapter.para: In addition to covering these tasks, we've included a section on how &PRODUCTABBR; access control works, including user roles and permissions and how &PRODUCTABBR; handles authentication and authorization.

note.title: The Initial Administrator Account
note.para: The initial administrator account for &PRODUCT; is set up by &COMPANYABBR; as an account with the SEA administrator role.
